name: Dig Dug.exe
description:
Revisit the classic maze arcade game created by Namco!

Control the protagonist Dig Dug to eliminate all the Pookas and Fygars on the screen using an air pump to inflate them to bursting, in order to progresses to the next stage.

Watch out, as enemies chase Dig Dug through dirt in the form of ghostly eyes, only becoming solid in the air where his pump can stun or destroy them. Enemies eventually become faster and more aggressive and the last one will try to escape.

Game created for the #Luigikidexechallenge.
